net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.component

Class ColumnRendererEditorListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.component.ColumnRendererEditorListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PropertyChangeListener, EventListener, ColumnModelListener

    class ColumnRendererEditorListener
extends Object
implements ColumnModelListener, PropertyChangeListener
    Listener for handling cell editor and renderer attachment.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

        public void columnHidden(ColumnModelEvent e)
        Description copied from interface: ColumnModelListener
        Tells listeners that a column has been hidden. Only called if the column had been previously shown, which is the case for all columns when the model is created.
        Specified by:
